instructions: Open a list, swipe left on the reminder, then tap More. Turn on Remind me at a location, then tap Location. In the search field, enter the address or location where you want to be reminded or choose a location from the list. Choose if you want a reminder when you leave or arrive at that location. Drag the black dot on the map in or out to change the perimeter of your reminder area. Tap Details to return to the previous screen, then tap Done.
